entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is introduced as a Daily Prophet reporter. She speaks to Harry Potter and the quill starts scribbling on the parchment.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as looking down at the quill when Rita Skeeter speaks.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is introduced as the newspaper that Rita Skeeter works for.

relationships.description: Rita Skeeter is a reporter for the Daily Prophet, which is mentioned in her introduction.
Rita Skeeter speaks to Harry Potter and he looks down at the quill when she speaks.
